description: AI for the command-line, built for pipelines. More information: https://github.com/charmbracelet/mods.

useCases.syntax: mods "{{write me a poem about platypuses}}"

useCases.description: Ask for comments on your code, in markdown format:
useCases.syntax: mods --format "{{what are your thoughts on improving this code?}}" < {{path/to/file}}

useCases.description: Ask for help with your documentation, in markdown format:
useCases.syntax: mods --format "{{write a new section to this readme for a feature that sends you a free rabbit if you hit r}}" < {{README.md}}

useCases.description: Organize your videos, in markdown format:
useCases.syntax: ls {{path/to/videos}} | mods --format "{{organize these by decade and summarize}}"

useCases.description: Read through raw HTML and summarize the contents, in markdown format:
useCases.syntax: curl "{{https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast?latitude=29.00&longitude=-90.00&current_weather=true&hourly=temperature_2m,relativehumidity_2m,windspeed_10m}}" | mods --format "{{summarize this weather data for a human}}"
